name: identifier
label: Identifier
description: A unique proper name or character sequence that identifies this particular study. (OMIABIS:0000006 )

name: name
label: Name
description: A name that designates this study. (OMIABIS:0000037 )

name: acronym
label: Acronym
description: The non-unique initials or abbreviated name used for identification. (NCIT:C93495 )

name: description
label: Description
description: A statement or piece of writing that provides details on this study. (OMIABIS:0000036, NCIT:C142704 )

name: inclusioncriteria
label: Inclusion criteria
description: The conditions which, if met, make an person eligible for participation in this study. (OBI:0500027 )

name: principalinvestigator
label: Principal investigator
description: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study. (OMIABIS:0000100, NCIT:C19924 )

name: contactemail
label: Contact email
description: An email address for the purpose of contacting the study contact person. (OMIABIS:0000035, NCIT:C176375 )

name: studydesign
label: Study design
description: A plan specification comprised of protocols (which may specify how and what kinds of data will be gathered) that are executed as part of this study. (OBI:0500000 )

name: startdate
label: Start date
description: The date on which this study began. (NCIT:C69208 )

name: completiondate
label: Completion date
description: The date on which the concluding information for this study is completed. Usually, this is when the last subject has a final visit, or the main analysis has finished, or any other protocol-defined completion date. (NCIT:C142702 )

name: currentstudystatus
label: Current study status
description: The status of a study or trial. (NCIT:C171103 )

name: numberofsubjectsenrolled
label: Number of subjects enrolled
description: An integer specifying the quantity of study subjects enrolled in the study at the current time. (NCIT:C153145 )

name: numerofsamplescollected
label: Numer of samples collected
description: An integer specifying the quantity of samples collected at the current time. (KISAO:0000326 )

name: belongstodatarelease
label: belongsToDataRelease
description: The act of making data or other structured information accessible to the public or to the user group of a database. (NCIT:C172217 )
